name: ABC Super Solitaire Free - A Brain Game
name_original: ABC Super Solitaire Free - A Brain Game
description:
Each move is inspired. Each step is exciting! This is another greatest puzzle game by Shen Zhongyuan!
It is not only challenging and addictive, but makes your brain soft as well!

Youtube Demo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kfh8HshY-oQ

***Game goal
Clear the board by removing three same tiles each time as quickly as possible.

***How to remove
* Move only one tile.
* Move up to four directions.
* Move maximum one time for each direction.
* Move until two pairs are at same line with no tiles between them.

****Game features
* You have two chances for both Hints and Undo.
* Show End Notification when game has no more pairs
* Show Removable Hints when ending game
* Show Moving Steps when selecting hints
